description: This version of the  Person Running emoji has the  Medium-dark Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Dark Brown Skin Tone on suppor
apple_vendor_description: Depicted with dynamic motion on Apple devices, the person running emoji with a medium-dark skin tone is captured in mid-stride, their body angled forward with a sense of energetic momentum. Apple's design showcases smooth, rounded limbs and a determined facial expression, enhanced by realistic lighting that highlights their active posture. This emoji, conveying speed, activity, and healthy living with Apple's signature polished aesthetic, is perfect for expressing enthusiasm for exercise, a swift departure, or a race against time.
